title: Death Altar

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Death Altar is a runic altar in which death runes are crafted upon from pure essence, providing 10 Runecraft experience per essence imbued. Level 65 Runecraft and completion of the quest Mourning's End Part II is required to craft death runes.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Death Altar
Altar
Released17 October 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestMourning's End Part II
LocationTemple of Light
OptionsCraft-rune
ExamineA mysterious power emanates from this shrine.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID34770

The Death Altar is a runic altar in which death runes are crafted upon from pure essence, providing 10 Runecraft experience per essence imbued. Level 65 Runecraft and completion of the quest Mourning's End Part II is required to craft death runes.

Players may create a death tiara here by using either a death talisman or a tiara on the altar whilst having both in the their inventory, granting 50 Runecraft experience. A catalytic tiara can also be created here by using a catalytic talisman and gold tiara, granting 42.5 Runecraft experience.

Upon entering the Death Altar, the music track La Mort plays.

Contents

  • 1 Location
    • 1.1 The ruins
    • 1.2 The Underground Pass
  • 2 Gallery
  • 3 Trivia

Location[edit | edit source]

The location of the mysterious ruins used to enter the Death Altar.

As with most other runic altars, it can either be accessed via the Abyss or the mysterious ruins found on the bottom level of the Temple of Light.

To enter the mysterious ruins, players either have to use a death talisman on the ruins, or click "Enter" on the ruins while wearing a death tiara. Alternatively, a catalytic talisman or tiara can be used.

As the altar is one of the least-accessible in terms of distance from a bank, it's recommended to use the Abyss in order to craft a large amount of runes.

The ruins[edit | edit source]

Entering the ruins by walking requires entering the Temple of Light (remember to bring your Crystal trinket) and using the following directions.

  1. Go up the stairs at the main entrance.
  2. Go south and up the ladder.
  3. Go the centre of the temple.
  4. Climb down the next stairs twice.
  5. Rotate the mirror to open the light door.

Note: When leaving, remember to rotate the mirror again for future visits.

The Underground Pass[edit | edit source]

Alternatively, the Death Altar can be entered from the dwarven camp in the Underground Pass. This is also a way to enter this area if you have forgotten to rotate the mirror when exiting through the ruins.

  1. Make your way to the western entrance to the Underground Pass. (Teleport to Lletya or Prifddinas.)
  2. Go down the well.
  3. Make your way to the lower level (either by falling on a jump or by making it to the stairs at the southern end of the map).
  4. Go to the dwarf camp in the south-west corner of the map.
  5. Descend the cave in the south-west corner of the dwarf camp.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • The entrance to the Death Altar.

  • The inside of the Death Altar.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The main music, La Mort, is French for "Death".
  • The ability to sell cats to the citizens of West Ardougne for death runes was a Chekhov's gun hinting that the Death Altar is located near West Ardougne.
  • The area existed in-game alongside all other Runic altars when the skill was launched, but not made accessible until 2005.

The '''Death Altar''' is a [[runic altar]] in which [[death rune]]s are crafted upon from [[pure essence]], providing 10 [[Runecraft]] [[experience]] per essence imbued. Level 65 [[Runecraft]] and completion of the [[quest]] [[Mourning's End Part II]] is required to craft death runes.

Players may create a [[death tiara]] here by using either a [[death talisman]] or a [[tiara]] on the altar whilst having both in the their inventory, granting 50 [[Runecraft]] [[experience]]. A [[catalytic tiara]] can also be created here by using a [[catalytic talisman]] and [[gold tiara]], granting 42.5 Runecraft experience.

Upon entering the Death Altar, the [[music]] track [[La Mort]] plays.

==Location==
{{Map|name=Death Altar|align=left|mtype=pin|x = 1859|y = 4638|mapID = -1|height = 275|width = 275|caption = The location of the mysterious ruins used to enter the Death Altar.}}
As with most other [[runic altar]]s, it can either be accessed via the [[Abyss]] or the [[Mysterious ruins#Death|mysterious ruins]] found on the bottom level of the [[Temple of Light]].

To enter the mysterious ruins, players either have to use a [[death talisman]] on the ruins, or click "Enter" on the ruins while wearing a [[death tiara]]. Alternatively, a [[catalytic talisman]] or [[catalytic tiara|tiara]] can be used.

As the altar is one of the least-accessible in terms of distance from a bank, it's recommended to use the [[Abyss]] in order to craft a large amount of runes.

===The ruins===
Entering the ruins by walking requires entering the [[Temple of Light]] (remember to bring your Crystal trinket) and using the following directions.

#Go up the stairs at the main entrance.
#Go south and up the ladder.
#Go the centre of the temple.
#Climb down the next stairs twice.
#Rotate the mirror to open the light door.
''Note'': When leaving, remember to rotate the mirror again for future visits.

===The Underground Pass===
Alternatively, the Death Altar can be entered from the dwarven camp in the Underground Pass. This is also a way to enter this area if you have forgotten to rotate the mirror when exiting through the ruins.

#Make your way to the western entrance to the Underground Pass. (Teleport to Lletya or Prifddinas.)
#Go down the well.
#Make your way to the lower level (either by falling on a jump or by making it to the stairs at the southern end of the map).
#Go to the dwarf camp in the south-west corner of the map.
#Descend the cave in the south-west corner of the dwarf camp.

==Gallery==
<gallery mode="packed" heights="160">
Death Altar outside.png|The entrance to the Death Altar.
Death Altar inside.png|The inside of the Death Altar.
</gallery>

==Trivia==
*The main music, [[La Mort]], is French for "Death".
*The ability to sell [[cat]]s to the citizens of [[West Ardougne]] for death runes was a {{WP|Chekhov's gun}} hinting that the Death Altar is located near West Ardougne.
*The area existed in-game alongside all other Runic altars when the skill was launched, but not made accessible until 2005.
